text: un logo ne apne paas ilm aa jaane ke baadh hee eqtelaaf kiya (aur wo bhi) baahmi zidh bahes se aur agar aap ke rab ki baath ek waqth muqarrar tak ke liye pehle hee se qaraar pa gayi hoyi na hoti, to yaqinan un ka faysla ho chuka hota aur jin logo ko un ke baadh kitaab di gayi hai, wo bhi us ki taraf se uljhan waale shak mein pade hoye hai
